mapper.select:
select sl.servey_no , sl.serveyitem_queno , sum(case when sl.num = 1 then sl.cnt else 0 end) as answer1 , sum(case when sl.num = 2 then sl.cnt else 0 end) as answer2 , sum(case when sl.num = 3 then sl.cnt else 0 end) as answer3 , sum(case when sl.num = 4 then sl.cnt else 0 end) as answer4 , sum(case when sl.num = 5 then sl.cnt else 0 end) as answer5 , sl.serveyitem_question , sl.loginID , sl.lecture_no , sl.lecture_seq , dc.detail_name as name from ( select ts.servey_no ,ts.serveyitem_queno ,ts.serveyitem_question ,ts.num ,ifnull(ll.loginID,0) as loginID ,ifnull(ll.lecture_no,0) as lecture_no ,ifnull(ll.lecture_seq,0) as lecture_seq ,ifnull(ll.cnt,0) as cnt from ( select ts.servey_no ,ts.serveyitem_queno ,ts.serveyitem_question ,ll.num from tb_serveyitem ts , ( select 1 as num union select 2 as num union select 3 as num union select 4 as num union select 5 as num ) ll ) ts left outer join ( select servey_no ,serveyitem_queno ,servey_answer ,count(*) as cnt ,lc.loginID ,lc.lecture_no ,lc.lecture_seq from tb_servey se inner join tb_lecture lc on lc.lecture_seq = se.lecture_seq
where lc.loginID = 'teacher' group by se.servey_no, se.serveyitem_queno, se.servey_answer, lc.lecture_seq ) ll on ll.serveyitem_queno = ts.serveyitem_queno and ll.servey_no = ts.servey_no and ll.servey_answer = ts.num ) sl inner join tb_detail_code dc on dc.group_code = 'lecture_no' and sl.lecture_no = dc.detail_code where sl.loginID = 'teacher' group by sl.servey_no ,sl.serveyitem_queno ,sl.lecture_seq order by sl.serveyitem_queno , sl.lecture_Seq
